## Vector4.Minimize() method

Returns a vector with the minimum values from the left and right vectors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Minimize(left: ReadOnlyVector4, right: ReadOnlyVector4): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | left vector to minimize |
|  right | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | right vector to minimize |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

a new vector with the minimum of the left and right vector values
